title: Direct X error after champion select
body: I picked my champion, and when I was about to go into loading screen the game crashed due to a direct x bug, I restarted comp and I had never had any issues, and I have not been able to repeat it. Don't know why I was unable to connect but it cost me game :(

replies.body:
I've had the same problems recently. Everything is up to date but after champ select won't load into game claiming DirectX error. Just had remake against me in ranked queue because of this. I had just played a match without this issue. Not sure what else to do, if this happened in between a series of games nothing to do to catch this and not get penalty for leaving ranked queue :(

Tried clean install of my drivers... hopefully that will help.

Directx error are usually an indication there may be corrupt/missing files in either your directx install or in your display driver. To prevent this from happening in the future, I strongly encourage you to work through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if you have any questions.
